Simulate latent process with noise

simulate.ngme_model.Rd

Simulate latent process with noise

# S3 method for ngme_model
simulate(object, nsim = NULL, seed = NULL, ...)

Arguments

object

ngme model specified by f() function

nsim

ignored

seed

seed

...

ignored

Value

a realization of latent model

Examples

simulate(f(1:10, model="ar1", rho = 0.4, noise = noise_nig()))
#> Error in f(1:10, model = "ar1", rho = 0.4, noise = noise_nig()): To many variables included in f(): 1:10 0.4 noise_nig()
simulate(f(rnorm(10), model="rw1", noise = noise_normal()))
#> Error in f(rnorm(10), model = "rw1", noise = noise_normal()): Argument `noise' in formula specification
#> 
#> 		f(rnorm(10), noise = noise_normal(), model = "rw1")
#> 
#>   is invalid. Valid arguments are:
